name: Ghouligan Tee
description:
Design by Doyle

Sizes : S - M - L - XL - XXL

Tee size Guide -

S 34-36 
M 38-40 
L 42-44 
XL 46-48 
XXL 50-52

* 100% cotton 180/190gsm 
* Cotton/Lycra® rib crew neck with taped neckline for comfort

Produced within 10/14 working days (UK ONLY)* Then Shipped. 
Regular delivery is 7 working days after production plus 1st class postage

Delivered within 14 days (International)*

*Might take up to 21 days during busy periods

Example shown is of a Small tee. Design size may differ depending on shirt size.

JUST TAG YOUR PICTURE WITH #RAWMEATCREEPZ ON TWITTER/TUMBLR/INSTAGRAM FOR YOUR CHANCE TO WIN A GOODIE BAG. WINNERS PICKED AT RANDOM EACH MONTH.

name: Raw Meat PSA Sweatshirt
description:
Design by Michael Shantz 
Sizes : S - M - L - XL - XXL

Sweatshirts - size guide

S 35-37 
M 38-40 
L 41-43 
XL 44-46 
XXL 47-49

Please note: Production is 7/10 days - then shipped.

Deliveries can take up to between 10 to 15* working days in the UK and 2-3 weeks abroad, from receipt of payment, depending on volumes & stock availability. Thank you for your understanding and patience!

*Might take up to 21 days during busy periods

Printed on adult set-in sleeve crew neck sweatshirt.

* Double needle stitching.

* Quarter turned body to eliminate centre crease.

* 2x1 fashion rib with Lycra.

Please note. Example shown is size Small. Print size may differ depending on garment size

JUST TAG YOUR PICTURE WITH #RAWMEATCREEPZ ON TWITTER/TUMBLR/INSTAGRAM FOR YOUR CHANCE TO WIN A GOODIE BAG. WINNERS PICKED AT RANDOM EACH MONTH.

name: Radioactive Reaper Zip Hood
description:
Design by Doyle

With large back print & plain front.

Available in S-M-L-XL-XXL

Set-in sleeves

Drawstring double fabric hood with self-coloured draw cord

Deep front pouch pockets

Single jersey neck tape for comfort

Ribbed hem and cuffs with Lycra® for shape retention

Twin needle stitching detail throughout

* 100% cotton 180/190gsm 
* Cotton/Lycra® rib crew neck with taped neckline for comfort

Produced within 10/14 working days (UK ONLY)* Then Shipped. 
Regular delivery is 7 working days after production plus 1st class postage

Delivered within 14 days (International)*

*Might take up to 21 days during busy periods

Please note, the example shown is a small. Print size may differ slightly depending on garment size.

JUST TAG YOUR PICTURE WITH #RAWMEATCREEPZ ON TWITTER/TUMBLR/INSTAGRAM FOR YOUR CHANCE TO WIN A GOODIE BAG. WINNERS PICKED AT RANDOM EACH MONTH.

name: Hunting Season Sticker
description:
The sticker is printed on the highest quality vinyl stock (1.2 mil) and offer a FREE UV Gloss (1 mil) laminate finish over the vinyl to ensure the highest quality custom stickers. Lamination also helps the longevity of our products. Our sticker will last outdoors and be fade free for up to 5 years

£2.00 each

or

3 for £5
